channel.title: News on CityU Wang Lab
channel.description: Recent content in News on CityU Wang Lab

item.title: News of our lab
item.description: 2019 · 2019.03 Congratulations to Dr.XinWang for promotion to Associate Professor! · 2019.02 Our Neuromedicine research of Zebra fish are on the cover of Nature Communication! Our research: ‘High-throughput Brain Activity Mapping and Machine Learning as a Foundation for Systems Neuropharmacology’ were on the cover of Nature Communication for one week. And It had been widely reported by numerous Big Media. The details could be found here
